title: 16th-century gallows and dozens of skeletons discovered in France
summary: Archaeologists have identified a 16th-century gallows structure and nearly a dozen mass burial pits in Grenoble, France.

title: Cassius the giant crocodile died from sepsis after 40-year-old dormant infection burst from 'abscess,' necropsy reveals
summary: Cassius was an 18-foot-long saltwater crocodile living in captivity in Marineland Crocodile Park in Australia. He died last year at the age of about 120, and we finally know why.

title: 'Very novel and very puzzling': Unknown species of squid spotted burying itself upside down, pretending to be a plant
summary: A new study reveals an unknown species of whiplash squid burying itself upside down in the deep sea — a first-of-its-kind behavior for cephalopods.

title: China's Great Green Wall: The giant artificial forest designed to slow the expansion of 2 deserts
summary: Since 1978, China has planted more than 66 billion trees along its 2,800-mile-long northern border, and it wants to plant 34 billion more over the next 25 years to complete its "Great Green Wall."

title: 'A scale almost too big to imagine': Scientists spot monster black hole roaring with winds at more than 130 million mph
summary: A black hole 30 million times the mass of the sun has produced winds one-fifth the speed of light, stunning scientists.

title: المحكمة الإدارية تحدد جلسة بحث لمستحقات أساتذة جامعة ابن طفيل بالقنيطرة
summary: حددت المحكمة الإدارية بالرباط، اليوم الجمعة، موعدا لعقد جلسة بحث بشأن ملف مستحقات عدد من أساتذة جامعة ابن طفيل بالقنيطرة، وذلك بمكتب القاضية المقررة، عند الساعة الثانية عشرة والنصف زوالا. ويأتي هذا الإجراء بعد صدور الحكم التمهيدي رقم 394 بتاريخ 21 نونبر 2025، ضمن الملف عدد 2025/7112/548،أكمل القراء…
body: حددت المحكمة الإدارية بالرباط، اليوم الجمعة، موعدا لعقد جلسة بحث بشأن ملف مستحقات عدد من أساتذة جامعة ابن طفيل بالقنيطرة، وذلك بمكتب القاضية المقررة، عند الساعة الثانية عشرة والنصف زوالا. ويأتي هذا الإجراء بعد صدور الحكم التمهيدي رقم 394 بتاريخ 21 نونبر 2025، ضمن الملف عدد 2025/7112/548، أكمل القراءة » المقالة المحكمة الإدارية تحدد جلسة بحث لمستحقات أساتذة جامعة ابن طفيل بالقنيطرة fمنشورة على جريدة الصباح .

title: The Best Meteor Shower of the Year Is Coming—Here’s How to Watch
summary: The highlight of the year, the Geminids are the most active and colorful meteor shower, offering the chance to see hundreds of shooting stars every hour when they peak in mid-December.

title: التحقيق في التلاعب بأموال “أوراش” بتاونات
summary: أحال الوكيل العام باستئنافية فاس، أخيرا، على الفرقة الجهوية للشرطة القضائية، شكاية جديدة تتعلق باختلالات في البرنامج الاجتماعي “أوراش”. وأمر بالبحث في مضمونها والاستماع لكل من له علاقة باختلاس وتبديد أموال بشأنه والتلاعب في المشروع، قبل إعادة ربط الاتصال به لتلقي تعليمات جديدة ومناسبة على ضوء الأبح…
body: أحال الوكيل العام باستئنافية فاس، أخيرا، على الفرقة الجهوية للشرطة القضائية، شكاية جديدة تتعلق باختلالات في البرنامج الاجتماعي “أوراش”. وأمر بالبحث في مضمونها والاستماع لكل من له علاقة باختلاس وتبديد أموال بشأنه والتلاعب في المشروع، قبل إعادة ربط الاتصال به لتلقي تعليمات جديدة ومناسبة على ضوء الأبحاث. أكمل القراءة » المقالة التحقيق في التلاعب بأموال “أوراش” بتاونات fمنشورة على جريدة الصباح .

title: James Webb telescope spots 'monster stars' leaking nitrogen in the early universe — and they could help solve a major mystery
summary: Researchers using the James Webb Space Telescope spotted huge stars leaking nitrogen in an early galaxy, hinting that such 'monster stars' might have been the source of ancient supermassive black holes.

title: Einstein was right: Time ticks faster on Mars, posing new challenges for future missions
summary: Clocks on Mars tick faster by about 477 microseconds each Earth day, a new study suggests. This difference is significantly more than that for our moon, posing potential challenges for future crewed missions.

title: When does winter start? Your guide to the 2025 winter solstice.
summary: Astronomical winter begins Sunday, Dec. 21 in the Northern Hemisphere. Here's how the solstice works.

title: Mysterious X-ray signal from deep space may be the scream of a star ripped apart by two black holes
summary: A strange X-ray signal spotted decades ago may be the result of a star that got attacked by two black holes, one after the other.

title: New discoveries at Hadrian's Wall are changing the picture of what life was like on the border of the Roman Empire
summary: The British northern frontier was the edge of the Roman world — and a place of violence, boredom and opportunity, experts told Live Science.

title: إدراج "الكشري المصري" في قائمة "اليونسكو" للتراث
summary: أعلنت منظمة الأمم المتحدة للتربية والعلوم والثقافة (اليونسكو) إدراج "الكشري المصري" على القائمة التمثيلية للتراث الثقافي غير المادي للإنسانية لعام 2025.

title: Exposing a silent cancer
summary:
Nature, Published online: 10 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03942-4

Pancreatic cancer is one of the deadliest malignancies, and it is increasingly occurring in young people — especially women. An uptick in research fundin…
body: Nature, Published online: 10 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03942-4 Pancreatic cancer is one of the deadliest malignancies, and it is increasingly occurring in young people — especially women. An uptick in research funding is a welcome development in the push to transform treatment.

title: Pancreatic cancer is evasive. Is the nervous system the reason why?
summary:
Nature, Published online: 10 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03943-3

A growing body of research suggests tumours rely on proteins and genes that are unique to the nervous system to persist in the body.
body: Nature, Published online: 10 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03943-3 A growing body of research suggests tumours rely on proteins and genes that are unique to the nervous system to persist in the body.

title: SOS: RNA-processing mechanism rescues genes from invasive DNA
summary:
Nature, Published online: 10 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03734-w

Transposable elements can insert into genes, disrupting protein-coding potential. Researchers discover a mode of RNA processing, ‘SOS splicing’, that pro…
body: Nature, Published online: 10 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03734-w Transposable elements can insert into genes, disrupting protein-coding potential. Researchers discover a mode of RNA processing, ‘SOS splicing’, that provides a quick fix.

title: 'It is simply too hot to handle': 2024 was Arab region's hottest year on record, first-of-its-kind climate report reveals
summary: The Arab region just had its hottest year on record, a new climate report reveals.

title: "الكشري" على رادار اليونسكو.. لماذا طلبت مصر تسجيله رسميا؟
summary: يترقب المصريون حصول "الكشري المصري" على اعتماد منظمة اليونسكو لإدراجه ضمن قائمة التراث الثقافي غير المادي لعام 2025، خلال اجتماع المنظمة المنعقد في العاصمة الهندية نيودلهي، حيث تبحث عشرات الترشيحات المقدمة من 78 دولة.

title: Is the 'Star of Bethlehem' really a planet? A bright visitor this month may hold a clue.
summary: A brilliant point of light is rising in the eastern sky soon after dark this month, drawing comparisons to the "Star of Bethlehem."

title: Food will be more affordable — if we double funds for agriculture research now
summary:
Nature, Published online: 09 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03970-0

A global drop in public and private investment in agricultural science in the past four decades is partly to blame for high food prices, an analysis reve…
body: Nature, Published online: 09 December 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03970-0 A global drop in public and private investment in agricultural science in the past four decades is partly to blame for high food prices, an analysis reveals.

title: بعد 3 أيام من اختفائه.. إنقاذ طفل سوري دفن حيا في تركيا
summary: أفادت وسائل إعلام تركية بعثور فرق البحث والإنقاذ في ولاية هاتاي على طفل سوري بعد اختفائه يوم الجمعة الماضية، حيث ضربه خاله على رأسه بحجر، وقام بدفنه.

title: Historic search for 'huge missing piece' of the universe reveals new secrets of particle physics
summary: Scientists hunted dark matter and solar neutrinos with one of the largest experiments yet. While the neutrinos likely appeared, dark matter results couldn't be confirmed.

title: Ash Pendant: The only known depiction of a pregnant Viking woman
summary: The Ash Pendant was discovered in a Viking Age burial mound in Sweden and may have been used by a female shaman.

title: زلزال بقوة 6.36 درجة يضرب اليونان ويصل تركيا وإيطاليا
summary: قال المركز الألماني لأبحاث علوم الأرض (جي.إف.زد) اليوم السبت إن زلزالا بقوة 6.36 درجة ضرب اليونان.

title: Lost Indigenous settlements described by Jamestown colonist John Smith finally found
summary: Excavations along the Rappahannock River in Virginia have revealed the likely spot of Indigenous villages once described by John Smith.

title: Ethereal structure in the sky rivals 'Pillars of Creation' — Space photo of the week
summary: The twin telescopes of the Gemini Observatory mark 25 years of discovery as students name distant nebula Ua ʻŌhiʻa Lan.

title: What was the loudest sound ever recorded?
summary: Determining the "loudest recorded sound" depends on how you define sound and on which measurements you choose to include.

title: New NASA, ESA images show 3I/ATLAS getting active ahead of its close encounter with Earth
summary: NASA and ESA both shared new images of the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS this week, as the agencies gear up for the mysterious object's closest approach to Earth on Dec. 19.

title: Unusual, 1,400-year-old cube-shaped human skull unearthed in Mexico
summary: Archaeologists discovered an unusually flat-topped skull at a pre-Hispanic Mesoamerican site.

title: 1,800-year-old 'piggy banks' full of Roman-era coins unearthed in French village
summary: An excavation in a small French village reveals three jars with thousands of Roman coins.

title: What if Antony and Cleopatra had defeated Octavian?
summary: How would history have unfolded if Antony and Cleopatra had defeated Octavian? Would they have ruled the Roman Empire?

title: صور وفيديو.. هيكل "ريشات" المذهل في صحراء موريتانيا
summary: هيكل جيولوجي مذهل عمره لا يقل عن 100 مليون عام.. أشبه بعين حمراء أو عين ثور يمكن رؤيته من الفضاء.
